name: Deathblast
description: An administrator's ultimate weapon - a devastating blast of raw cosmic power that utterly annihilates the target, reducing them to subatomic particles. This spell is so overwhelmingly powerful that it bypasses all defenses and resistances, instantly obliterating anything it touches. No corpse remains.

messages.caster: You channel the raw power of the cosmos and unleash an apocalyptic DEATHBLAST at {target}!
messages.target: {caster} raises their hand, and reality itself screams as an incomprehensible wave of annihilation rushes toward you!
